title: How to Make Peanut Butter Pine Cones for Birds

steps.headline: Spread out an old newspaper for easy clean up.
Wrap a string around the top of the pine cone for hanging.
Tie a knot in the string so it makes a loop.
Smear peanut butter all over the pine cones with a spoon or butter knife.
Sprinkle bird seed over the pine cones.
steps.description: It should stick to the peanut butter.

steps.headline: Place in a plastic bag to take home put in freezer for one hour.
At home,hang the pine cones on the limbs and branches of trees, the birds will love them!

text: Take one pinecone.  Spread out an old newspaper for easy clean up.  Wrap a string around the top of the pine cone for hanging.  Tie a knot in the string so it makes a loop.  Smear peanut butter all over the pine cones with a spoon or butter knife.  Sprinkle bird seed over the pine cones. It should stick to the peanut butter. Place in a plastic bag to take home put in freezer for one hour.  At home,hang the pine cones on the limbs and branches of trees, the birds will love them!
